trans-unit.source: Add visits to INSTALLED_APPS
trans-unit.target: 增加对INSTALLED_APPS的访问量

trans-unit.source: BOTS_USER_AGENTS by default will have the following values
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,BOTS_USER_AGENTS将有以下值

trans-unit.source: BOTS_USER_AGENTS: (list) this is used to define whether user is real or bot is user by BotVisitorMiddleware. Regexes are supported
trans-unit.target: BOTS_USER_AGENTS:(list)用于定义用户是真实用户还是BotVisitorMiddleware的用户。支持的Regexes有

trans-unit.source: Configuration
trans-unit.target: 配置

trans-unit.source: Django visits is to be used as a hit-counter application for Django-powered web apps.
trans-unit.target: Django访问量是作为Django驱动的Web应用的点击计数器应用。

trans-unit.source: From inside of a template you can get
trans-unit.target: 从模板内部你可以得到

trans-unit.source: Have fun!
trans-unit.target: 玩得开心点

trans-unit.source: IGNORE_URLS: (list) urls to ignore e.g. static urls etc. NOTE : only ignores by not incrementing the hit-counter for the request whose META.PATH_INFO starts with any string in this list. The visit is still logged though. Same thing happnes for IGNORE_USER_AGENTS and BOTS_USER_AGENTS settings below.
trans-unit.target: IGNORE_URLS：（列表）要忽略的URL，例如静态URL等。注意：仅忽略不增加其META.PATH_INFO以该列表中任何字符串开头的请求的命中计数器，即可忽略。该访问仍被记录。下面的IGNORE_USER_AGENTS和BOTS_USER_AGENTS设置也会发生相同的情况。

trans-unit.source: IGNORE_USER_AGENTS: (list) this is used to define what user agents to ignore. Regexes are supported
trans-unit.target: IGNORE_USER_AGENTS。(list)用于定义要忽略的用户代理。支持Regexes

trans-unit.source: If you want count url visit manually you can do it the way below
trans-unit.target: 如果你想手动计算网址访问量,你可以按下面的方法来做

trans-unit.source: If you want count visits per object then it’s similar to the example above
trans-unit.target: 如果您想计算每个对象的访问次数，则类似于上面的示例

trans-unit.source: If you want to count visits automatically per url the you should add CounterMiddleware to MIDDLEWARE_CLASSES
trans-unit.target: 如果你想自动计算每个url的访问量,你应该添加CounterMiddleware到MIDDLEWARE_CLASSES。

trans-unit.source: If you want to count visits automatically per url with get params you should add URI_WITH_GET_PARAMS=True to your settings.py
trans-unit.target: 如果你想用get params自动计算每个url的访问量,你应该在settings.py中添加URI_WITH_GET_PARAMS=True。

trans-unit.source: If you want to filter bots from real users then in MIDDLEWARE_CLASSES set
trans-unit.target: 如果你想从真正的用户中过滤机器人,那么在MIDDLEWARE_CLASSES中设置为

trans-unit.source: If you want to filter some type of user agents you can define IGNORE_USER_AGENTS in your settings.py
trans-unit.target: 如果你想过滤某些类型的用户代理,你可以在settings.py中定义IGNORE_USER_AGENTS。

trans-unit.source: MIN_TIME_BETWEEN_VISITS: (number) the minimum allowed time between visits for the user to update counter
trans-unit.target: MIN_TIME_BETWEEN_VISITS。(数字)用户更新计数器的最小允许访问时间。

trans-unit.source: Note: to get uri visits using get_visits templatetag you should add the following to TEMPLATE_CONTEXT_PROCESSORS
trans-unit.target: 注意:如果要使用get_visits templatetag来获取uri访问量,你应该在TEMPLATE_CONTEXT_PROCESSORS中添加以下内容。

trans-unit.source: REQUEST_FIELDS_FOR_HASH: (list) used to generate unique identifier for visitor
trans-unit.target: REQUEST_FIELDS_FOR_HASH:(列表),用于为访问者生成唯一的标识符。

trans-unit.source: URI_WITH_GET_PARAMS: (bool) use get params to identify diferents uris
trans-unit.target: URI_WITH_GET_PARAMS:(bool)使用get params来识别不同的URIS。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: VISITS_OBJECTS_AS_COUNTERS: (bool) enable or disable the behavior of visits objects as counters (on False, every diferent visits is counted in a diferent object)
trans-unit.target: VISITS_OBJECTS_AS_COUNTERS:(bool)启用或禁用访问对象作为计数器的行为(在False时,每个不同的访问都会被计算在不同的对象中。

trans-unit.source: Visit counter for Django
trans-unit.target: 访问Django计数器

trans-unit.source: Welcome
trans-unit.target: 欢迎光临

trans-unit.source: You have two ways of how to use this app; first is to count requested urls (CounterMiddleware), the second is to count object visits (aka models)
trans-unit.target: 你有两种方法来使用这个应用,第一种是统计请求的URL(CounterMiddleware),第二种是统计对象访问量(也就是模型)。

trans-unit.source: You settings file should contain the following settings
trans-unit.target: 你的设置文件应该包含以下设置

trans-unit.source: object visits using get_visits
trans-unit.target: 使用get_visits访问对象

trans-unit.source: url visits using get_visits templatetag
trans-unit.target: url访问量使用get_visits templatetag。
